tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Gururaj Biradar, indeed the most treasured doctors that I have been privileged to meet. My 9year old daughter has visited other doctors multiple times for cough, cold, fever & other ailments. But it was Dr Gururaj Biradar who identified that my daughter having thyroid in her throat..a condition called lingual thyroid. I was so stressed.
Dr Guru sir took active approach & asked us to do few blood tests & thyroid scan. He also referred us to pediatric surgeon. Fortunately with God's grace, no surgery was required 
         Dr sir started my daughter on thyroid tablets as her thyroid levels were low. My daughter is absolutely fine now. Dr Gururaj is truly God sent. Never met such a friendly & professional doctor..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Booked an appointment from Practo for which my appointment was not confirmed and got a call from Manipal Hospital saying doctor won't be taking any appointment today, only walk-ins are allowed. When visited the hospital I got to know that appointment were booked for the same day but my appointment was not confirmed for me. Later the receptionist asked me to wait for an hour for doctor consultation and vaccination.Basically, ½hr task got delayed by 2hr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Gururaj Biradar, pediatrician was easy to talk to, did an excellent job answering all of my questions, and I really appreciated the time he spent with us. He was very gentle and kind ** *** ** ***** ********* ************** I am happy with our visit.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very unhappy/ exhausted mother. I never recommend this Doctor Gururaj  Biradar. 
I will tell you honestly, ** ** *** *** ** ** *************  Such a ignorance and not responsible at all.
I have consulted him in Manipal hospital Whitefield. Btw he knows my kid and my family from day one of my kid and that is how I blindly trusted him. ** ** **** ******* ****** ***** ******* ** *** **** ***** ** **** ***** *** ******* ****** ** *** ******** **** ** *** ******* *** ******* ********* ** ** *** *** ** *** ******** **** ** *** ***** ** **** ** **** *** **** ** *** ***** **** *** *** **** ** **** ***** ** ****** **** **** *** * **** *** **** *** ****** *** *** ***** ******* **** *********** * ***** ** *** * ****** ** **** *** ***** *** ********* ** ** *** **** *** **** ** **** But dear parents’ carful with your kids and don’t trust blindly anyone and make sure he is giving proper medicines and understand the kid condition and monitor closely. and I always recommend having a friends or family circle doctor seek their advice and support. 

I would like to explain the entire incident here. 
My kid 4-year-old was not well. Symptoms are life cold fever and cuff, and I also had a blood test done where the CRP % was little Hight this was my issue then soon after I visit Dr Gururaj Biradar, he told we need a admission and need to admit for 4 to 5 days then it will be fine. Then he gave me admission form and he called somebody from emergency department and suggested few blood tests worth of 15k but none of the reports are +ve and the issue what he supposed to check (CRP %) he didn’t perform only. And finally, he started the treatment for pneumonia, *** **** ** *** ***** ******* **** ********** 
But very next day morning only my kid is not even talking to me and saw that he started swelling mostly on the face and neck region and when I try to feed him forcibly but my kid said, mom I am unable to swallow anything and my neck is paining a lot then I try to touch his neck and observed large swelling around the neck and I immediately called the doctor and trying to explain my problem but no body was listening my words * **** ******** ******* ** **** **** *********** ***** *** doctor is not willing to listen at all and finally someone suggested to do the neck ultrasound but nothing was observed and I was speechless I have no solution and no one willing to looking at my kid but I was finally hoping on god to save my kid . because I lost all hops with this Gururaj. and finally, I was checking with Nurse. The nurse said that doctor suggested to change medicine so after 20 hrs. of the issue report the nurse started with new antibiotics and with that, I observed the swelling reducing ** **** **** *** ****** ** *** ***** ** ***** *** ******* ** ************* ********* ** **** ** *** ***** ******* ********* ******  anyways the treatment continued for only swelling around the next for 4 days nothings else was done. Other wise I didn’t observe any fever in my kid and he was able to eat some food with that I managed to get the discharge and visited the doctor and told anyways whatever happened is happened and I stay in remote place where I cannot come to hospital immediately ad I need your advice incase of any fever/ any reactions after discharge and he said he cannot answer the call but he will be available for messages but after 3 days of discharge I try to message him saying that I see fever during night with my kid but I waiting for 2 days he didn’t response only for multiple messages  be careful with this kid of doctors. 

I have all the proofs and details with me. * ***** **** ******* *** ***** ******* *******  ** **** ** *** ** ** **** ****** I'm not good at writing part. I would like to explain rater if someone had already faced similar issue.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Request all patients/parents to check the cost of vaccinations before doctors administer them to your baby. In my case, the Doctor gave my kid a vaccine worth 5440 Rs without my consent or without sharing the cost of the vaccine. The doctor did not share the cost before injecting and I had to pay almost 8210 for vaccination - see attached bills.
I **** **** ******** **** ************ ** **** **** *** *** **** * ***** ***** ** *** **** ******* **** ****** * ****** **** *** ***** ******** *** ****** ** ******* ** *** * *** ******** ******* ***** **** ************ ***** ** **** ***** ** ****** ****** *** ******* ************ ********* *** ********* ** ** ******* they did not accept credit cards and asked me to pay cash or by Phone Pay. I had to pay 8210 Rs by phone pay. * **** **** ******* ** *** ************ *** ****** I only visited for a cough and cold and inquired about only an Influenza shot but the doctor added a meningitis vaccine which cost me 5440 Rs extra.

review: From the very first time he met us, the doctor immediately put my teenager at ease, took him through his thought process and treated him for his complaint.  With his gentle manner, he got his young patient's buy-in for his course of treatment. He is efficient, effective, personable, patient, open to feedback and an all-round great doctor. Would definitely recommend him without any reservations.
